question: In which state is the National Authority for recycling of ships proposed to be established?
explanation:
The Union Government designated “Director General of Shipping” as the National Authority for recycling of ships. This has been done under the provisions of Recycling of Ships Act, 2019.
The National Authority for recycling of ships would be established at Gandhinagar in Gujarat. The location has been chosen since Alang in Gujarat is the home to the world’s largest ship recycling industry in the world.
